page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LOUISE
page.content: During the week louise gets up at 07.30.She gets dressed and then goes to the bathroom to have a wash.She has breakfast which is usually cornflakes and a cup of tea.When finished she puts on her coat and collects her school bag.She walks to school with her friend and her friend's sister.When school starts she takes her books out of her tray and puts them on the desk.The class then do silent reading for about twenty minutes.They then line up for assembly and sit down in the hall.Mr.Broadbent, the headmaster,then reads a story that usually has some kind of a meaning. Returning to class,they then do maths. which is sometimes decimals,fractions, long division,adding or subtraction. After this is playtime,lasting fifteen minutes.The children play games such as "tig" and "London".
